guide_greeting.scene: Welcome to our AI ethics game! Get ready to explore the moral implications of AI technology and make conscious choices for yourself and your loved ones.

guide_explanation.scene: Help us evaluate AI technologies for ethicality. Your input matters as we discern which AI technology is acceptable. Compare two cards and provide your verdict.

start_scene.scene: At the end of the game, you will be able to see how your choices compare to others.
